body.name: HONGTUO Car Toys and Playmat Storage Bag - City Vehicle Toys and Gifts for Toddlers Age 1-3
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 8 hrs 4 mins
features: Eight different models: Mini City Car toys come in eight different models. The shapes of these vehicles are easy for young children to grasp and manipulate and help develop their hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills. Includes bus, school bus, jeep c car, sedan, police car, ambulance, cab and vintage car.

Alloy Material: The Mini City Car Toy is made from high-quality alloy material, which makes it durable and long-lasting. This material is also safe for young children to play with. The alloy material is resistant to wear and tear, which means that the toy can withstand rough play without breaking or falling apart.

Suitable for 1-3 Year Olds: The Mini City Car Toy is designed specifically for children aged 1-3 years old. It is the perfect size for small hands, easy for young children to pick up and play with. The toy is also lightweight, which means that children can carry it around with them wherever they go.

Play Mat Storage Bag: The Mini City Car Toy comes with a play mat storage bag, which makes it easy to keep the toy and its pieces organized. The play mat can be laid out on the floor, providing a safe and comfortable space for children to play with the toy. When playtime is over, the car can be easily stored in the bag, making cleanup quick and easy.

Develops Creativity and Imagination: The Mini City Car Toy is not just a simple toy, but a tool for developing creativity and imagination in young children. With its eight different Car Toy, children can create endless combinations and designs, helping to develop their problem-solving and critical thinking skills. The toy also encourages children to use their imagination, as they can create their own stories and adventures with the different shapes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These cars are fun for multiple ages. The colors are vibrant and a good size for smaller hands. You can also open the bag up so you can drive the cars on the little road. All in all, a great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'm always reading reviews and the reviews for this check out. My 2 year old loves these cars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My Grandson loved them.
reviews.reviewText: Like the track folds up for a bag to carry. My grandson really liked that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not recommended for a ONE YEAR OLD
reviews.reviewText: I searched for “gifts for a one year old boy” and found these cute cars with a carry bag. My one year old grandson loves cars right now, so I purchased them for a Christmas gift. When they arrived, the front of the box is clearly marked “3+” and the cars are much smaller than they appeared on the Amazon site, and metal with little pieces that could come unattached if chewed on by a one year old. These are going back, thanks for the inconvenience, Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My 14 mth pld grandson loves this. Love that it is also a carry bag for the cars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Baby car map
reviews.reviewText: The picture ad is very deceiving, the cars looked like the was to be made of soft material and the came as a metal car and the car map looked much bigger

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very nice toy for the price. Cars are really cute and run as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE that these aren't cheap plastic! Finally toys that are made similar to how they were "back in the day." These little cars are so adorable, the design on them is perfect too! I can't say enough great things about these! Our nieces and nephews have so much fun playing with them on the mat that it comes with

Wir haben die Spielzeugautos für unseren Sohn zu Weihnachten gekauft, die Qualität ist super, bei der Tasche waren wir ein bisschen enttäuscht, da wir gedacht haben das man darauf ausgeklappt richtig spielen könnte, dafür ist sie jedoch leider doch zu klein. Aber alles in allem, sehr zu empfehlen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 22, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Ein ausgesprochen schönes Set, das sogar mich als Frau begeistert (und unseren Sohn ja sowieso).Die Autos wirken sehr wertig und zeigen sich im Alltag selbst nach längerer Zeit - auch des Herumgeworfen-Werdens durch einen Ein- und Dreijährigen - äußerst robust. Zudem sind sie durch ihr rundliches Design nicht nur kindgerecht und sicherer geformt, sondern wirken dadurch auch irgendwie niedlich. Mein persönlicher Favorit ist das pinkfarbene Auto mit der britischen Flagge auf dem Dach, das ist schon außergewöhnlich originell und - wie aber auch die anderen - alles andere als langweilig.Von der Länge her entsprechen sie "normalen" Autos anderer Hersteller, wie z. B. von Hotwheels oder auch die kleinen von Siku, sind aber deutlich breiter und massiver.Auch die mitgelieferte Spieldecke wird von unserem Dreijährigen oft und gern benutzt. Sehr praktisch ist, dass sie dank Klettverschlüssen sogar als stabile Transporttasche für noch viel mehr Autos dienen kann.Wir empfehlen das Set auf jeden Fall sehr gern weiter!
Der gelbe Bus sind beim Auspacken gleich die Reifen abgegangen und kaputt
